entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:29 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wawa Airport 02:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -30.1°C
Pressure: 102.9 kPa
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -36
Dewpoint: -33.7°C
Wind: N 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late in the evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
